title: Cloudflare Lays Out Plan to Reduce Internet’s Carbon Footprint
sub_head: The provider of cybersecurity tools and other cloud services committed to canceling out all its carbon dioxide emissions and introduced tools to help its customers cut their own
body:
Cloud-infrastructure company Cloudflare Inc. on Tuesday announced an effort to cut the internet’s carbon footprint by eliminating its own carbon dioxide emissions and introducing tools to help its customers reduce theirs.
“The internet’s responsible for about 2% of all global emissions. That’s sort of the equivalent of the entire aviation industry so it’s not trivial,” said Matthew Prince, Cloudflare’s co-founder and chief executive, referring to estimates by Boston Consulting Group. “And as a big provider in the space, we...
